thread.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Pt. 1 - Bill Condon
thread.title_full: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Pt. 1 - Bill Condon

title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Pt. 1 - Bill Condon
text: The Last 30 minutes are haunting, tense, and emotional! by Anthoni If you're not moved by the last 30 minutes, then you're not a Twilight fan. Music by Carter Burwell was brilliant during the last scenes! It was the Best One. by Brianna12 I've seen all of the movies, read all the books, and in my opinion, this was the best movie yet. I don't like too much action in the movies, because it doesn't look real, so to me it was wonderful. To those complaining it was too long, you weren't hooked on the movie. I thought it went by so fast, I couldn't believe it was over. It left me begging for more which I'm sure was the film maker's intention. So suspenseful, so good, and I just can't wait to see it again. 1...2...3...
